name: Pizza Game (itch)
description:
Get to the end of the stage and deliver the pizza before time runs out. You don't want to have to give this guy their pizza for free, do you? Things are made more complicated by the spoopy scary ghosties and skellingtons along the way. Why are they there? I dunno, I needed enemies.

Arrow Keys - Move
Z - Jump
X - Attack

Made for #GCJam2
